data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heller, Klaus-Gerhard, Hemp, Claudia, Massa, Bruno, Kocinski, Maciej, Warchalowska-Śliwa, Elzbieta (2018): Paraplangiasinespeculo, a new genus and species of bush-cricket, with notes on its biology and a key to the genera of Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera: Tettigonioidea) from Madagascar. Journal of Orthoptera Research 27 (2): 143-153, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.27.24243, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.27.24243
